reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kid headphones. Recommended.
reviews.reviewText: We've had these a week as of August 21st. If they fail us I'll edit the review, but so far, really GREAT. I'd bought other children's headphones in the last two years for my two kids (for school and home) and they always end up getting wrecked likely because the cord is vinyl and easy to destroy. One ear phone would always fail after a few weeks. These old styles also had sponge foam covers on the ears that always start to shred after some time.This particular brand and style I'm reviewing has many pros and so far I cannot give it any cons.First, the nylon cord is excellent and sturdy. It's long (that may be an issue for younger children) but it's perfect for my 6 year old and 9 year old.The sound quality is great for kids. There's no noise reduction on this model, but these headphones aren't some high tech stereo sound product. The sound volume is normal and not too loud for young ears.The ear cups are super soft, like those headphones us kids had in the 1970s/1980s. Adjustable and comfortable, easy to store away loops for the cord.The color pink I bought here is nice, the kid likes it very much. Very happy with it.The price is excellent. Should your kid mess the headphones up in any way you at least haven't lost much on expense.All in all, I highly recommend these. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids!
reviews.reviewText: These headphones have lasted a long time. We get a new pair every year for school. Cord is great and does not get knotted and love that they are adjustable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant color, kids will love it
reviews.reviewText: Really cool design, I like that it’s foldable. My son absolutely loves it. He took it to school to use with his school IPad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality kids headphones for a nice price
reviews.reviewText: My son needed headphones for his computer at school and these had excellent reviews so we went with them. My son is 5 in kindergarten and these fit well. He says they are comfortable and works well. Listening myself they have decent sound quality and can block out most outside noise. They do have some noise (static) at louder volumes but we would never have him listen at that loudness. They seem durable as he whips them in his backpack back and forth to school daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for tablets
reviews.reviewText: I have bought several of these for my kids. We have some in the car, at home, and they have them at school! Easy to use and durable! Sound is perfect and they fold up to fit any small space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These headphones are very comfortable and the sound quality was perfect! They say they are for kids but fit me quite well! Worth the price!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 years and still going
reviews.reviewText: I would highly recommend these. My son totes them around in his backpack daily and uses all the time. The cord cover looks beat up but the headphones still work perfectly for him

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don’t ever posts reviews but I had to make ine for this product. I Purchased the Mint green back in November 2022 and they are still working, no breaks. Just came back to purchase some new ones for school only.I also purchased the pink ones a month or two earlier and one of the headphone side stopped working.As far as the noise cancellation.. I constantly have to tell the kids to take atleast one side to the back of the ear since they do not hear anything I say.FYI: the kids have had these headphones EVERYWHERE and being mistreated as usually kids do and I’m just now having to purchase a new set only because I don’t want them to stop working during school time.Definitely recommend!
